Data Fields
i2s_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2S) Master

I2S IO Attributes. More...

#include <i2s.h>

Collaboration diagram for i2s_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the I2S port.

Data Fields

u8 pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17XXDEV)
 
u32 mode
 Word width e.g. I2S_WORDWIDTH_16.
 
u32 frequency
 The I2S audio frequency.
